params._mintConfig: contains addresses and values(where to mint tokens and how much)
params._tokenConfig: The address of the token, name, and symbol. If no addr is passed will a new token get created.

returns._1: MerkleMinter new merkle minter address(zero address in case passed token addr was not zero)

newToken(address,(address,string,string).notice: TODO: Worth considering the decimals ? if addr is zero, creates new token + merkle minter, otherwise, creates a wrapped token only.

userdoc.notice: This contract is used to create a Token.
